title: NOTE: Removal steps in this procedure may contain installation details.

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 1. On both sides, remove the A-pillar trim panels.
lstDescriptions:
Refer to: A-Pillar Trim Panel (501-05 Interior Trim and Ornamentation, Removal and Installation).
 Refer to: A-Pillar Trim Panel - Police (501-05 Interior Trim and Ornamentation, Removal and Installation).

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 2. On both sides, remove the B-pillar trim panels.
lstDescriptions: Refer to: B-Pillar Trim Panel (501-05 Interior Trim and Ornamentation, Removal and Installation).

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 3. On both sides, remove the D-pillar trim panels.
lstDescriptions: Refer to: D-Pillar Trim Panel (501-05 Interior Trim and Ornamentation, Removal and Installation).

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 4. Remove the overhead console.
lstDescriptions: Refer to: Overhead Console (501-12 Instrument Panel and Console, Removal and Installation).

steps.stepContent: 2. NOTE: RH side shown, LH side similar.

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 1. Position aside the rear door weatherstrip.
2. Remove the bolt.
3. Release the clips and the magnets.
4. Slide down and out and position aside the C-pillar trim panel.

steps.stepContent: 3. Remove the retainers and the front grab handle.
4. NOTE: RH side shown, LH side similar.

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 1. Remove the retainers cover.
2. Remove the retainers.
3. Seperate the sun visor.
4. If equipped.
lstDescriptions: Disconnect and remove the sun visor.

steps.stepContent: 5. NOTE: RH side shown, LH side similar.

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 1. Disconnect the headliner wire harness electrical connector.
2. Release the clips and position the wire harness aside.
1. Disconnect the washer hose coupling.
lstDescriptions: Refer to: Washer Hose Coupling (501-16 Wipers and Washers, General Procedures).

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 2. Open the clips and position aside the washer hose.

steps.stepContent: 11. NOTE: RH side shown, LH side similar.

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 1. Position the cover aside.
2. Remove the retainer and the second row coat hook assembly.

steps.stepContent: 12. NOTE: RH side shown, LH side similar.

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 1. Seperate the lamp assembly.
2. Disconnect and remove the lamp assembly.

steps.stepContent: 13. NOTE: RH side shown, LH side similar.
14. Disconnect the D-pillar washer hose coupling.

lstSubSteps.stepContent: 1. Position the seat in the full forward position.
2. Position the seat in the full reclined position.

steps.stepContent: 16. Release the clips and magnets and lower the headliner down.
17. Release the clips and magnets and lower the headliner down.
18. NOTICE: To avoid damaging the headliner when folding the headliner wings, fold the headliner wings so
